thread.title: Nick Cannon Announces The Birth Of His Son Golden With A Tender Instagram Snap!
thread.title_full: Nick Cannon Announces The Birth Of His Son Golden With A Tender Instagram Snap! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Nick Cannon Announces The Birth Of His Son Golden With A Tender Instagram Snap!
text:
Nick Cannon 's world just got a little bigger!
On Wednesday, the comedian announced the birth of his son Golden Sagon Cannon , sharing a black-and-white photo with his newborn on Instagram .
Related: Nick Is Not Here For Mariah's Seemingly Scripted Romance! 
The intimate snap (above) came complete with a touching caption, in which the 36-year-old revealed the baby boy was born on Tuesday.
He wrote: 
"Weeping may endure for a night, but Joy cometh in the morning! No matter how hard the world may hit you, God always reminds us of our purpose! #TrueHappiness. Welcome to Earth Son! Golden â€˜Sagon' Cannon 2/21/17 #Awakened"
Cannon confirmed he was going to be a father again last November, admitting his quick attempt at being celibate clearly didn't work out for him.
The TV personality did not mention Golden's mother Brittany Bell in the post, but previously revealed they would be co-parenting together.
Nick is also co-parenting his twins Moroccan and Monroe with his ex Mariah Carey , so it looks like he got his hands full. Maybe it's a good thing he quit hosting America's Got Talent ?
We're so excited for Nick and the newest edition to his family!
[ Image via Nick Cannon/ Instagram . ] 
Tags: baby blabber , brittany bell , celeb kidz , golden sagon cannon , instagram , mariah carey , nick cannon , perezcious parenting
